onHitSpEffect.Wiki: The on-hit SpEffect to apply to enemies when this attach effect is present.

passiveSpEffectId_1.Wiki: The passive SpEffec to apply when this attach effect is present.

passiveSpEffectId_2.Wiki: The passive SpEffec to apply when this attach effect is present.

passiveSpEffectId_3.Wiki: The passive SpEffec to apply when this attach effect is present.

attachTextId.Wiki: The text to use for the title and description for this effect.

displayPercentageSymbol.Wiki: If enabled, the displayed modifier will use a % symbol.

allowWylder.Wiki: If enabled, this attach effect is usable with Wylder.

allowGuardian.Wiki: If enabled, this attach effect is usable with Guardian.

allowIroneye.Wiki: If enabled, this attach effect is usable with Ironeye.

allowDuchess.Wiki: If enabled, this attach effect is usable with Duchess.

allowRaider.Wiki: If enabled, this attach effect is usable with Raider.

allowRevenant.Wiki: If enabled, this attach effect is usable with Revenant.

allowRecluse.Wiki: If enabled, this attach effect is usable with Recluse.

allowExecutor.Wiki: If enabled, this attach effect is usable with Executor.

overrideBaseEffectId.Wiki: The base SpEffect for attach effects with multiple levels.

displayedModifierValue.Wiki: The value displayed in the UI for this effect.

overrideEffectId.Wiki: The override SpEffect for attach effects with multiple levels.

statusIconId.Wiki: The icon ID to use to display this effect under the top HUD bar.

attachFilterParamId.Wiki: The attach filter to apply to this effect.

exclusivityId.Wiki: If two equipped relics share an effect, the relic selection screen will display a red exclamation mark over the shared effect.

permanentSpEffectId.Wiki: The SpEffect to apply for a permanent buff.
